## PdfExtractor.StartPage property

获取或设置要执行提取操作的页范围内的起始页。

```csharp
PdfExtractor ext = new PdfExtractor();
ext.BindBdf("sample.pdf");
ext.StartPage = 2;
ext.EndPage = 5;
ext.ExtractText();
```

```csharp
public int StartPage { get; set; }
```
